title: Intel
body:
**Intel** is the currency of the criminal underworld.

While cash buys you tools and bribes, **intel** opens doors that no amount of money can. It's the whispered tip about a security guard's shift change, the blueprint hidden in a dusty filing cabinet, the name of someone who knows someone.

In this world, {{neon_cyan}}knowledge is power{{/}}, and those who hoard it rise to the top. Every piece of intel you gather brings you closer to bigger scores, better connections, and jobs that lesser criminals can only dream about.

~~Keep your ears open and your eyes sharp.~~

title: Lockpick
body:
**Lockpicks** — the tools of the trade for anyone serious about B&E.

You bought this set from a {{soft_yellow}}"hobby shop"{{/}} that definitely wasn't asking questions. The clerk winked as they handed you the case: {{dim_gray}}"For educational purposes only, yeah?"{{/}}

Inside the worn leather pouch, you'll find a full set of tension wrenches, hooks, and rakes — everything you need to convince a lock that you're supposed to be on the other side of it.

It's amazing what doors open when you have the right tools. Literally.

~~just don't tell your mom where you got them~~

title: CRIME COMMITTER VI
body:
this is the game. please welcome. the aim of this game is crime, and lots of it. you start out as a grown baby (toddler) and you are just about to learn just how delicious and nutritious doing something naughty is.

you start in your bedroom, and you're tempted to break some rules, you're tempted to stay up past your bedtime. if you do this, you start down a slippery slope and a life of crime. your only real opportunity to escape this life is to quit this god foreskin game right this second, and go outside and feel some sweet blades of grass. 

if on the other hand you dare to dive headfirst into this life of crime, then this is the game for you. 

take your time. committe a crime. find a crime, and press D to sort out the details before you start, or Q to just go for it. and then wait. this game is about waiting but hopefully not too long. after waiting, you'll maybe have success or not. use this succcess to access more crime. use more crime to access more waiting. you can literally do both of those things in game. one is fictional but waiting is for life. 

enjoy
